unnormalised: Ola and Uber fares in Bangalore are reportedly surging again, bhai! Just yesterday, commuting from Koramangala to Indiranagar cost me ₹350 during peak hours (8:30 AM). unnormalised: Traffic snarls are adding to the problem. Construction work near Silk Board junction and the ongoing Metro expansion are causing major delays. Commuters are now opting for BMTC buses or even trying to carpool to save some ₹₹.
